snippet.title: "The definitive My DeFi Pet experience" in Binance Smart Chain 1st Anniversary
snippet.description:
A compilation of KardiaChain's presentations and gameplay footages to provide the best information and the entertaining journey into the My Defi Pet world. 
To celebrate Binance Smart Chain 1st Anniversary, many influencers joins in the talk to explain how is My DeFi Pet becomes one of the most played blockchain game on BSC, what are the main 6 captivating features of My DeFi Pet, a deep explanation about how the game was incubated and developed with passion from KardiaChain and Topebox.

Chapters:
00:00 Intro and story trailer
02:12 Gameplay
02:58 What is My DeFi Pet?
04:49 Achievements
05:30 KardiaChain's presentation on My DeFi Pet with BSC
08:26 Unique game features
10:53 Overview on My DeFi Pet from KardiaChain on multiple channels
13:13 Youtubers' experience with My DeFi Pet
16:40 How to get started
19:40 Outtro
